availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Crittendon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentukcy native. Son of Arthur H. Wallace and Letitia Preston Hart Wallace. Farmer in Crittendon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kentucky, Crittendon County, West half of county, p. 395.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District No 3 City of Louisville, p. 278A.
Find A Grave, "William Pope Wallace (1837-1881)," Memorial #21505610, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/21505610/ (accessed October 09, 2018).
